upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 4.10, 4.20, 4.30
* Updated SDK from 7.19.3 to 7.23.1
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class to match the Advanced Setting Article.

* Includes firmware versions: 4.10, 4.20
* Fixed a bug: With Parameter 28 set to disabled (Dimmer Scene Control - Off), After turning the lights on with a single click (upper paddle), the single click to turn off lights (lower paddle) didn't work anymore.
